products.name: Rose
products.description: The timeless beauty of roses brings elegance and romance to any garden or bouquet. Choose from a variety of colors and fragrances to express your love and admiration.

products.name: Sunflower
products.description: Bright and cheerful, sunflowers are a symbol of happiness and positivity. Their large, vibrant blooms make a stunning addition to any garden or floral arrangement.

products.name: Tulip
products.description: Delicate and graceful, tulips come in a wide range of colors and are known for their elegant simplicity. They bring a touch of sophistication to any space.

products.name: Orchid
products.description: Exotic and captivating, orchids are renowned for their stunning and intricate blooms. These elegant plants add a touch of luxury and beauty to any home or office.

products.name: Lavender
products.description: With its soothing fragrance and beautiful purple flowers, lavender is a popular choice for aromatherapy and relaxation. It's also a lovely addition to gardens and bouquets.

products.name: Jasmine
products.description: Known for its intoxicating fragrance, jasmine is a climbing vine that produces delicate white flowers. It's perfect for adding a touch of romance and enchantment to any garden.

products.name: Lily
products.description: Majestic and elegant, lilies are known for their large, showy blooms and sweet fragrance. They make a striking statement in gardens and bouquets alike.

products.name: Daffodil
products.description: A harbinger of spring, daffodils bring a burst of sunshine with their bright yellow or white flowers. They symbolize new beginnings and are a delight to behold.

products.name: Peony
products.description: With their lush, full blooms and delightful fragrance, peonies are a favorite among flower enthusiasts. They add a touch of elegance and charm to any garden or floral arrangement.

products.name: Marigold
products.description: Vibrant and cheerful, marigolds are known for their bold colors and ability to repel pests. They are a popular choice for adding a pop of color to gardens and containers.

products.name: Pansy
products.description: With their charming "faces" and wide range of colors, pansies are a delightful addition to any garden or window box. They bring joy and cheerfulness to any space.

products.name: Geranium
products.description: Versatile and easy to care for, geraniums are known for their vibrant blooms and attractive foliage. They are a popular choice for adding color to gardens and containers.

products.name: Carnation
products.description: With their ruffled petals and sweet fragrance, carnations are a classic choice for bouquets and floral arrangements. They come in a variety of colors and symbolize love and admiration.

products.name: Hydrangea
products.description: Known for their large, showy flower heads, hydrangeas are a stunning addition to gardens and landscapes. They come in a range of colors and add a touch of elegance to any setting.

products.name: Iris
products.description: Graceful and elegant, irises are known for their striking blooms and vibrant colors. They bring a touch of sophistication and beauty to gardens and bouquets.

products.name: Dahlia
products.description: With their intricate and diverse blooms, dahlias are a favorite among flower enthusiasts. They come in a wide range of colors and add drama and beauty to any garden or arrangement.

products.name: Violet
products.description: Delicate and charming, violets are known for their dainty flowers and sweet fragrance. They are a lovely choice for adding a touch of whimsy to gardens and containers.

products.name: Petunia
products.description: Versatile and easy to grow, petunias are known for their profusion of colorful blooms. They are a popular choice for adding vibrant splashes of color to gardens and hanging baskets.

products.name: Chrysanthemum
products.description: With their abundant and long-lasting blooms, chrysanthemums are a symbol of autumn and are often associated with festivals and celebrations. They bring beauty and joy to any setting.

products.name: Aloe vera
products.description: Known for its medicinal properties, aloe vera is a succulent plant with thick, fleshy leaves. It's popular for its soothing gel and is a great addition to any indoor garden or skincare routine.
